overview:
Sweden based Irish IT security specialist with a start-up track record.

Background in entrepreneurial and technical leadership experience in seed-stage, venture-backed startups, and global technology corporations. Strong international background with over 10 years work & education in Ireland, Sweden, France, and the US.

Previously: VP R&D at Smart Card manufacturer Gemplus, Aix-en-Provence, France. Co-founder/CTO at PKI specialists Celo Communications (Celo), Mountain View, California & Stockholm, Sweden.

A software developer by trade, has developed a number of commercial security applications and spoken extensively on cryptography & network security.

Holds a PhD (2009) for his thesis on Elliptic Curve Cryptography on Modern Processor Architectures
